member.name: T:ReferenceCheck.ReferenceChecker
member.summary: Base class for running checks on reference numbers

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.ReferenceChecker.checkNumeric(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a character is a numeric
member.param: The character(s) to be checked for a numerical value

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.ReferenceChecker.checkReference(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether a reference number is valid
member.param: The reference to be checked
member.returns: Either the validated reference number or an empty string

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.ReferenceChecker.weightedValue(System.String)
member.summary: Calculate the value of the reference being checked. The weightable value is effectively converting each character into a numerical value then producing a total of those values
member.param: The reference to be checked
member.returns: The total value of the characters in the reference

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.ReferenceChecker.checkCharacter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates a check character based on the total value of the characters in the reference
member.param: The total value of the characters in the reference
member.returns: The check chracter which should apply to the reference

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.ReferenceChecker.regularExpression
member.summary: Returns the regular expression that determines the format of the reference
member.returns: The regular expression relevant to the reference type

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.ReferenceChecker.weightedValues
member.summary: Returns the value to be applied against each character in the reference
member.returns: An integer array with the values to be applied

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.ReferenceChecker.ccPosition
member.summary: Returns the list of the possible check characters for the reference type
member.returns: A string containing the possible check characters

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.ReferenceChecker.referenceLength
member.summary: Returns the expected length of the reference number
member.returns: An integer showing the expected length of the reference

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.ReferenceChecker.modValue
member.summary: Returns the tyep of modulus check that applies to a specified reference type
member.returns: An integer showing the modulus value to apply

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.ReferenceChecker.initialWeight
member.summary: Returns any initial value that should be included when calculating the weight of a reference

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.ReferenceChecker.ConvertedNumeric(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts an alpha character in the reference to a numeric - for reference types where alpha characters form part of the weighted value for a reference number
member.param: The character to be converted to a numeric
The weighted value to be applied to the alpha character
member.returns: An integer representing the associated value for the character

member.name: T:ReferenceCheck.CotaxReferenceChecker
member.summary: Checks the validity of a COTAX reference

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.CotaxReferenceChecker.regularExpression
member.summary: Returns the expected structure for a COTAX reference
member.returns: A string containing a regular expression with the expected COTAX structure

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.CotaxReferenceChecker.weightedValues
member.summary: Returns weight that applies to each character in the COTAX reference
member.returns: An integer array

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.CotaxReferenceChecker.possibleCCs
member.summary: Returns the check characters that apply to a COTAX reference
member.returns: A string - the order of the check characters are based on the associated remainder following a modulus check

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.CotaxReferenceChecker.ccPosition
member.summary: Returns the position of the check character within the reference
member.returns: An integer

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.CotaxReferenceChecker.referenceLength
member.summary: Returns the expected length of a COTAX reference number
member.returns: An integer

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.CotaxReferenceChecker.modValue
member.summary: Returns the nodulus value that applies when calculating the check character
member.returns: An integer

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.CotaxReferenceChecker.initialWeight
member.summary: Returns the initial value to be used when calculating the 'weight' of the characters in the reference number
member.returns: An integer - 0 (there is no initial value required for this reference type)

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.CotaxReferenceChecker.ConvertedNumeric(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts an alpha character in the reference to a numeric - for reference types where alpha characters form part of the weighted value for a reference number
member.param: The character to be converted to a numeric
The weighted value to be applied to the alpha character
member.returns: An integer representing the associated value for the character

member.name: T:ReferenceCheck.SAReferenceChecker
member.summary: Checks the validity of a SA reference

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.SAReferenceChecker.regularExpression
member.summary: Returns the expected structure for a SA reference
member.returns: A string containing a regular expression with the expected SA structure

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.SAReferenceChecker.weightedValues
member.summary: Returns weight that applies to each character in the SA reference
member.returns: An integer array - the order of the values match the order of the characters in the reference

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.SAReferenceChecker.possibleCCs
member.summary: Returns the check characters that apply to a SAFE reference
member.returns: A string - the order of the check characters are based on the associated remainder following a modulus check

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.SAReferenceChecker.ccPosition
member.summary: Returns the position of the check character within the reference
member.returns: An integer

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.SAReferenceChecker.referenceLength
member.summary: Returns the expected length of a SA reference number

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.SAReferenceChecker.modValue
member.summary: Returns the nodulus value that applies when calculating the check character
member.returns: An integer

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.SAReferenceChecker.initialWeight
member.summary: Returns the initial value to be used when calculating the 'weight' of the characters in the reference number
member.returns: An integer - 0 (there is no initial value required for this reference type)

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.SAReferenceChecker.ConvertedNumeric(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts an alpha character in the reference to a numeric - for reference types where alpha characters form part of the weighted value for a reference number
member.param: The character to be converted to a numeric
The weighted value to be applied to the alpha character
member.returns: An integer representing the associated value for the character

member.summary: Checks the validity of a 11 character VAT reference

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.VAT11ReferenceChecker.regularExpression
member.summary: Returns the expected structure for a 11 character VAT reference
member.returns: A string containing a regular expression with the expected VAT structure

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.VAT11ReferenceChecker.weightedValues
member.summary: Returns weight that applies to each character in the COTAX reference
member.returns: An integer array

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.VAT11ReferenceChecker.possibleCCs
member.summary: Returns the check characters that apply to a COTAX reference
member.returns: A string - the order of the check characters are based on the associated remainder following a modulus check

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.VAT11ReferenceChecker.ccPosition
member.summary: Returns the position of the check character within the reference
member.returns: An integer

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.VAT11ReferenceChecker.referenceLength
member.summary: Returns the expected length of a VAT reference number
member.returns: An integer

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.VAT11ReferenceChecker.modValue
member.summary: Returns the nodulus value that applies when calculating the check character
member.returns: An integer

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.VAT11ReferenceChecker.initialWeight
member.summary: Returns the initial value to be used when calculating the 'weight' of the characters in the reference number
member.returns: An integer - 0 (there is no initial value required for this reference type)

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.VAT11ReferenceChecker.ConvertedNumeric(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts an alpha character in the reference to a numeric - for reference types where alpha characters form part of the weighted value for a reference number
member.param: The character to be converted to a numeric
The weighted value to be applied to the alpha character
member.returns: An integer representing the associated value for the character

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.VAT11ReferenceChecker.checkReference(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether a reference number is valid
member.param: The reference to be checked
member.returns: Either the validated reference number or an empty string
member.remarks: any spaces will be removed from the reference prior to checking the check character

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.VAT11ReferenceChecker.weightedValue(System.String)
member.summary: Calculate the value of the reference being checked. The weightable value is effectively converting each character into a numerical value then producing a total of those values
member.param: The reference to be checked
member.returns: The total value of the characters in the reference

member.name: M:ReferenceCheck.VAT11ReferenceChecker.checkCharacter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates a check character based on the total value of the characters in the reference
member.param: The total value of the characters in the reference
member.returns: The check chracter which should apply to the reference
